title: Trying to Reconnect to Client problem
body:
Hi,
Every once in a while I get a "Trying to Reconnect" screen. The screen includes a link to a support page and the option to close the client. [picture](https://gyazo.com/58c431c14bce9ae51e79d2aac60cebc2)
it happens about once a minute and prevents me from accepting matches or even showing the accept. It keeps me in queue for several minutes after the queue was canceled by a party member and its a real issue.
Does someone know how to fix this issue?

I have been tried to do the ipv4 and ipv6 soloutions, didnt work.
I also did the riot solution with this [link (Riot Connection Guide)
](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues), didnt work.

Can anyone help me?

replies.body: Jesus christ riot team, I just did all your 4 steps on the troubleshoot page and i still get it. I'm guessing its YOUR client because our network is fine.

Does anyone have the fix plz tell ive done everything in the connection guide the ip dns internet explorer etc....
it still doesnt work
I have the exact same problem. Please tell me how you fixed that if you did, it is very annoying.

It looks like you might have an unstable connection that's losing comms with pvp.net and other services.  If the guide didn't work, hit us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so our tech team can help too.  Download the [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) as well to grab some logs to attach to the ticket.  We'll get back to you!
